The supervisorâ €™ s interface to the energy management system provides a mechanism for choosing between a report on the operating history or a statistical summary report. Each report consists of an ASCII file whose location and name can be selected by the operator.

If the statistical report is selected, the Energy Management System system shall present the operator with a list of available months from which to make a selection. After selecting one of the months, the system shall generate the ASCII report file. The statistical reports shall consist of the following statistics: 1) The percentage of time each heating and cooling unit was on for each day of that month; 2) For each thermometer, the ratio of the number of requests for a heating and cooling unit that was granted to the number of requests for a heating or cooling unit that was denied.

When the statistical report is selected, the energy management system presents the operator with a list of available months from which to make a selection. After selecting a month, the system generates the ASCII report file. Statistical reports consist of the following statistics: 1) The percentage of time that each heating and cooling device was turned on on on each day of the month; 2) For each thermometer, the ratio of the number of applications for a heating and cooling device that were granted to the number of applications for a heating or cooling device that were refused.
